setting_auto_encryptTip.message: Encrypt plaintexts in the input box automatically.

setting_auto_decryptTip.message: Decrypt ciphertexts after pages loaded automatically.

version_1_2_0_0.message: Internationalized, and both Chinese and English are supported

version_1_2_0_1.message: Errors occur while decrypting cypher-like texts

version_1_3_0_1.message: Support Ctrl+Q to quickly encrypt and decrypt the selected text

version_1_3_1_0.message: Fix manual decription bug caused by FireFox's bug

app_description.message: Encrypt & decrypt your texts in any site.

message_unsupportedWeiboDecAuto.message: It does not support automatic decryption of Weibo yet.

message_encryptionSuccess.message: The ciphertext has been copied to the clipboard!

guide_welcome.message: Welcome to use Make Zero! This page will guide you to enjoy it.üòÅ

guide_basic_pasteError.message: Failed to paste, please operate manually

guide_basic_encrypt_selectText.message: Please select texts you want to encrypt, or

guide_basic_encrypt_rightClick.message: Press {shortcut} to encrypt it. Or move the cursor to it, right click and choose the menu item {menuItemPath} in pop-up box.

guide_basic_encrypt_paste.message: You can paste the ciphertext in the input box below, or click {btn} button.

guide_basic_decrypt_selectText.message: Ciphertexts start with {ciphertextPrefix}, you can {clickMe} or move the cursor on follow ciphertext.

guide_basic_decrypt_rightClick1.message: If you selected the ciphertext, press {shortcut} or move the cursor to it and right click and choose the menu item {menuItemPath} in pop-up box to decrypt it.

guide_basic_decrypt_rightClick2.message: If the cursor has been put on the ciphertext, double click.

guide_autoEncryption_alertIfOn.message: Automatic encryption has been on. Please enter texts in the below input box in which the content will be automatically encrypted after finish.

guide_autoEncryption_alertIfOff.message: Automatic encryption has not been on yet, please switch it in the settings panel, and then refresh this page.

guide_autoDecryption_alertIfOn.message: Automatic decryption is on. So you can see the plaintext after this page loads completely. You can try to turn it off in the settings panel and refresh this page.

guide_autoDecryption_alertIfOff.message: Automatic decryption is off, So the ciphertext is shown. You can try to turn it on in the settings panel and refresh this page.
